languages.text: "Звездное Сиятельство! Как можно! Я даже выселки черни никогда вблизи не видел! Копошатся себе внизу — да и Бог-Император с ними". {n}Губернатор залпом опорожняет очередной наполненный слугами кубок.{/n} "Еще {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}амасека{/g} мне! Живо! Чего вылупился? Исполняй иди! Бездельников набрали..."

traits.locale_text: "Ваше Сиятельство! Как можно! Я даже выселки черни никогда вблизи не видел! Копошатся себе внизу — да и Бог-Император с ними".
traits.speaker: FW_FakeGovernor

languages.text: "Your Celestial Highness, how can you say such a thing! I have never even seen a lowborn village up close. They are cowering down there, thank the God-Emperor." {n}The governor empties another goblet brought to him by the servants.{/n} "Fetch us more {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}! Now! What are you looking at? Go, go! Useless layabouts..."
languages.original_text: "Звездное Сиятельство! Как можно! Я даже выселки черни никогда вблизи не видел! Копошатся себе внизу — да и Бог-Император с ними". {n}Губернатор залпом опорожняет очередной наполненный слугами кубок.{/n} "Еще {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}амасека{/g} мне! Живо! Чего вылупился? Исполняй иди! Бездельников набрали..."

traits.locale_text: "Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, how can you say even such a thing! I have never seen a lowborn village up close. They are cowering down there, may God-Emperor protect them." {n}The Governor empties another goblet offered by the servants.{/n} "Fetch more amasec! Now! What are you looking at? Go, go! Useless layabouts..."

"Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, how can you say even such a thing! I have never seen a lowborn village up close. They are cowering down there, may God-Emperor protect them." {n}The Governor empties another goblet offered by the servants.{/n} "Fetch more amasec! Now! What are you looking at? Go, go! Useless layabouts..."

Useless layabouts..."

"Your Celestial Highness, how can you say such a thing! I have never even seen a lowborn village up close. They are cowering down there, thank the God-Emperor." {n}The governor empties another goblet brought to him by the servants.{/n} "Fetch us more {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}! Now! What are you looking at? Go, go! Useless layabouts..."

languages.text: “来自上界的大人啊，您怎么能说出这样的话！我甚至连那些下等人出生的村庄都没见过。感谢神皇保佑，他们对我们敬畏有加。”{n}总督一口喝光了另一只仆人递过来的高脚杯。{/n}“多拿些{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}艾玛赛克酒{/g}来！快！你看什么看？快去，动起来！真是个没用的懒鬼……”
languages.original_text: "Your Celestial Highness, how can you say such a thing! I have never even seen a lowborn village up close. They are cowering down there, thank the God-Emperor." {n}The governor empties another goblet brought to him by the servants.{/n} "Fetch us more {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}! Now! What are you looking at? Go, go! Useless layabouts..."

traits.locale_text: “来自上界的大人啊，您怎么能说出这样的话！我甚至连那些下等人出生的村庄都没见过。感谢神皇保佑，他们对我们敬畏有加。”{n}总督一口喝光了另一只仆人递过来的高脚杯。{/n}“多拿些艾玛赛克酒来！快！你看什么看？快去，动起来！真是个没用的懒鬼……”

languages.text: «¡Su Excelencia Celestial, cómo puede siquiera insinuar tal cosa! Jamás he visto de cerca ninguna aldea de campesinos. Gracias al Dios Emperador, pululan todos allí abajo». {n}El gobernador apura otra copa que le acaba de traer uno de sus sirvientes.{/n} «¡Traednos más {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}! ¿Qué hacéis ahí parados? ¡Venga, vamos! Hatajo de holgazanes...».
languages.original_text: "Your Celestial Highness, how can you say such a thing! I have never even seen a lowborn village up close. They are cowering down there, thank the God-Emperor." {n}The governor empties another goblet brought to him by the servants.{/n} "Fetch us more {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}! Now! What are you looking at? Go, go! Useless layabouts..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Su Excelencia Celestial, cómo puede siquiera insinuar tal cosa! Jamás he visto de cerca ninguna aldea de campesinos. Gracias al Dios Emperador, pululan todos allí abajo». {n}El gobernador apura otra copa que le acaba de traer uno de sus sirvientes.{/n} «¡Traednos más amasec! ¿Qué hacéis ahí parados? ¡Venga, vamos! Hatajo de holgazanes...».

languages.text: "Semavi Efendimiz, nasıl böyle bir şey söylersiniz! Alt tabaka köylerini bile yakından görmüşlüğüm yoktur. Tanrı İmparator'a şükürler olsun ki alt tabakada sinmiş hâldeler." {n}Vali, hizmetkârların getirdiği başka bir kadehi daha silip süpürüyor.{/n} "Bize daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasek{/g} getirin! Hemen! Ne bakıyorsunuz? Gidin, gidin! İşe yaramaz aylaklar..."
languages.original_text: "Your Celestial Highness, how can you say such a thing! I have never even seen a lowborn village up close. They are cowering down there, thank the God-Emperor." {n}The governor empties another goblet brought to him by the servants.{/n} "Fetch us more {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}! Now! What are you looking at? Go, go! Useless layabouts..."

traits.locale_text: "Semavi Efendimiz, nasıl böyle bir şey söylersiniz! Alt tabaka köylerini bile yakından görmüşlüğüm yoktur. Tanrı İmparator'a şükürler olsun ki alt tabakada sinmiş hâldeler." {n}Vali, hizmetkârların getirdiği başka bir kadehi daha silip süpürüyor.{/n} "Bize daha fazla amasek getirin! Hemen! Ne bakıyorsunuz? Gidin, gidin! İşe yaramaz aylaklar..."

languages.text: 「天の閣下、どうしてそんなことが言えるのですか！私は生まれの卑しい村すら近くで見たことがありません。彼らはそこで萎縮しています。神帝陛下に感謝を」{n}総督は、使用人が持ってきた別のゴブレットを飲み干す。{/n}「もっと{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}アマセック{/g}を持ってきてくれ！今だ！何を見ているんだ？すぐだ、すぐ！使えない怠け者め…」
languages.original_text: "Your Celestial Highness, how can you say such a thing! I have never even seen a lowborn village up close. They are cowering down there, thank the God-Emperor." {n}The governor empties another goblet brought to him by the servants.{/n} "Fetch us more {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}! Now! What are you looking at? Go, go! Useless layabouts..."

traits.locale_text: 「天の閣下、どうしてそんなことが言えるのですか！私は生まれの卑しい村すら近くで見たことがありません。彼らはそこで萎縮しています。神帝陛下に感謝を」{n}総督は、使用人が持ってきた別のゴブレットを飲み干す。{/n}「もっとアマセックを持ってきてくれ！今だ！何を見ているんだ？すぐだ、すぐ！使えない怠け者め…」

languages.text: « Votre Altesse Célestissime, comment pouvez-vous dire une chose pareille ?! Je vous affirme n'avoir jamais ne serait-ce qu'approché un village de manants. L'Empereur soit loué, ils restent là, en bas. » {n}L'un des serviteurs tend un gobelet au gouverneur, qui le vide d'un trait.{/n} « Qu'on apporte de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}, et plus vite que ça ! Qu'est-ce que vous attendez ? Allez, allez ! Quelle bande d'inutiles... »
languages.original_text: "Your Celestial Highness, how can you say such a thing! I have never even seen a lowborn village up close. They are cowering down there, thank the God-Emperor." {n}The governor empties another goblet brought to him by the servants.{/n} "Fetch us more {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}! Now! What are you looking at? Go, go! Useless layabouts..."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Altesse Célestissime, comment pouvez-vous dire une chose pareille ?! Je vous affirme n'avoir jamais ne serait-ce qu'approché un village de manants. L'Empereur soit loué, ils restent là, en bas. » {n}L'un des serviteurs tend un gobelet au gouverneur, qui le vide d'un trait.{/n} « Qu'on apporte de l'amasec, et plus vite que ça ! Qu'est-ce que vous attendez ? Allez, allez ! Quelle bande d'inutiles... »

languages.text: "Eure himmlische Hoheit, wie könnt Ihr so etwas nur sagen! Ich habe noch nie ein Dorf der Niedergeborenen aus der Nähe gesehen. Sie kauern dort unten im Dreck, dem Gottimperator sei Dank." {n}Der Gouverneur leert einen weiteren Kelch, den ihm ein Diener gebracht hatte.{/n} "Bringt uns mehr {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasec{/g}! Sofort! Was glotzt ihr denn so? Husch, husch! Nutzlose Faulpelze ..."
languages.original_text: "Your Celestial Highness, how can you say such a thing! I have never even seen a lowborn village up close. They are cowering down there, thank the God-Emperor." {n}The governor empties another goblet brought to him by the servants.{/n} "Fetch us more {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}! Now! What are you looking at? Go, go! Useless layabouts..."

Was glotzt ihr denn so? Husch, husch! Nutzlose Faulpelze ..."
